entry.title: Awesome Npm Updates on Jan 18 - Jan 24, 2016
entry.content:
Articles

  • Unix philosophy and Node.js - Write programs that do one thing and do it well.
  • Optimizing the footprint of an npm package
  • The Art of Node (⭐9.9k) - An introduction to Node.js and client-side development with npm.

Registry

  • latest-version (⭐53) - Get the latest version of an npm package.
  • npm-user (⭐57) - Get user info of an npm user.
  • npm-email (⭐32) - Get the email of an npm user.
  • npm-user-packages (⭐5) - Get packages by an npm user.
  • npm-stats (⭐51) - Get data from an npm registry.

Other

  • generator-nm (⭐741) - Scaffold out an npm package.
  • enpeem-search (⭐4) - Search packages by scraping the npm web search.
  • npm-issues (⭐48) - Search known issues of all your packages at once.

entry.title: Awesome Npm Updates on Jan 11 - Jan 17, 2016
entry.content:
Articles

  • Small focused modules (⭐143)
  • Semver: A Primer (Must read!)
  • Semver: Tilde and Caret
  • Offline installation of npm packages

Web

  • NodeICO - Package badges.
  • Libraries.io - Package discovery.
  • npm-stat - Statistics charts for packages.
  • npmgraph - Visualization of dependencies.
  • npm trends - Compare package download counts over time.
  • npm-top - npm users by downloads.
  • npm semver calculator - Visually explore what versions of a package a semver range matches.

Browser extensions

  • Octo-Linker - Chrome extension to navigate across npm packages on GitHub with ease.
  • npm-hub - Chrome extension to explore npm dependencies on GitHub repos.

Publishing

  • np (⭐7.6k) - A better npm publish.
  • publish-please (⭐737) - Publish packages safely and gracefully.
  • npm-release (⭐102) - Making releasing to npm so easy a kitten could probably do it™.
  • pkgfiles (⭐84) - List all files which would be published in a package.
  • semantic-release (⭐22k) - Fully automated package publishing.

Registry

  • npm-name (⭐287) - Check whether a package name is available on npm.
  • package-json (⭐244) - Get the package.json of a package from the npm registry.
  • npm-keyword (⭐52) - Get a list of npm packages with a certain keyword.
  • dpn (⭐27) - Get the dependents of a user's npm packages.

Other

  • npm-home (⭐199) - Open the npm page of a package.
  • gh-home (⭐191) - Open the GitHub page of a package.
  • david (⭐967) - Check if your package dependencies are out of date.
  • npm-check (⭐6.6k) - Check for outdated, incorrect, and unused dependencies, as well as interactive update.
  • npm-shrinkwrap (⭐771) - A consistent shrinkwrap tool.
  • npm-windows-upgrade (⭐2.5k) - Upgrade npm on Windows.
  • normalize-package-data (⭐201) - Normalize package metadata.
  • npm-run-path (⭐105) - Run locally installed binaries in the terminal by name like with global ones.
  • local-npm (⭐1.2k) - Use npm offline.
  • npe (⭐93) - CLI for inspecting and editing properties in package.json.
  • engine-deps (⭐20) - Manage Node.js version specific dependencies with ease.

Command aliases

  • npm i → npm install
  • npm t → npm test
  • npm it → npm install && npm test
  • npm r → npm uninstall

FAQ / pre and post scripts

  • Check in node_modules vs. shrinkwrap
  • What is the difference between Bower and npm?
  • What does ^ mean in package.json versioning?
  • Find the version of an installed npm package
  • What's the difference between dependencies, devDependencies, and peerDependencies in package.json?

Community / pre and post scripts

  • #npm on Freenode
  • Reddit
  • Twitter

Documentation / pre and post scripts

  • Official
  • Troubleshooting (⭐18k)
  • Semantic versioning
  • Fixing npm permissions
  • package.json
  • npm run script
  • Stats API (⭐329)

Support / pre and post scripts

  • Twitter
  • Contact form
entry.summary: 54 awesome projects updated on Jan 11 - Jan 17, 2016
